A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a lifelong fan of Star Wars and was genuinely excited to see this movie\, even after the questionable character development with the new characters introduced in The Force Awakens (which is a totally different conversation). With that said\, this movie\, though beautifully directed\, acted\, and produced by all involved\, has destroyed Star Wars for me on multiple levels. As a Star Wars fan\, I am saying goodbye to this franchise and choosing to instead remember it how it was and not how it currently is. Maybe in 20 or so years we will have a good addition to the Star Wars saga that doesn't destroy everything that came before it. \n*The 1 star is for the flawless production of this film and pure  workmanship that went in to it
